definition: to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

pinyin: Zui4 gao1 Ren2 min2 Jian3 cha2 yuan4

sentences.english: When a public security organ demands the arrest of an offender, it shall obtain the approval of a people's procuratorate.
sentences.chinese: 公安机关要求逮捕人犯的时候，由人民检察院批准。

sentences.english: People's procuratorates at all levels may install judicial police as needed.
sentences.chinese: 各级人民检察院根据需要可以设司法警察。

sentences.english: The people's procuratorates in China are state organs for legal supervision.
sentences.chinese: 人民检察院是国家的法律监督机关。

sentences.english: The public security organ or the people's procuratorate shall inform the prison of the result of its handling.
sentences.chinese: 公安机关或者人民检察院应当将处理结果通知监狱。

sentences.english: The law-enforcement level of the court and procuratorate has been raised remarkably.
sentences.chinese: 法院和检察院的执法水平又有明显提高。

sentences.english: Prosecutor functions reflect the legal functions of the People's Procuratorate, which is their business.
sentences.chinese: 检察职能体现了人民检察院的法律职能，属于其业务。

sentences.english: The procuratorial personnel of the people's procuratorate shall be no less than 2 when performing their duties in a court.
sentences.chinese: 人民检察院检察人员出庭履行职责时，不得少于二人。

sentences.english: The King County Prosecutor's Office has charged Lewis with making a fraudulent insurance claim.
sentences.chinese: 金县的检察院已经以保险诈骗罪起诉刘易斯。

sentences.english: The people's court shall conduct a trial denovo of a case protested by the people's procuratorate.
sentences.chinese: 人民检察院提出抗诉的案件，人民法院应当再审。

sentences.english: The People's Procuratorate shall notify the victim of its decision made after reexamination.
sentences.chinese: 人民检察院应当将复查决定告知被害人。

sentences.english: The people's procuratorates at all levels shall ensure the official vehicles as required by the appearance of procuratorial personnel in court.
sentences.chinese: 各级人民检察院应当保证检察人员出庭所需公务用车。

sentences.english: To undertake the functions of the Work Office of Procuratorate of the State Forestry Bureau;
sentences.chinese: 承担国家林业局检察院法院工作办公室的工作。

sentences.english: I don't know if the Procuratorate or the court have re-sought expert testimony on Yang Jia or not.
sentences.chinese: 我不知，检察院或法院有没有对杨佳重新做司法鉴定。

sentences.english: These ties can have an especially constraining effect on prosecutorial and court decisions.
sentences.chinese: 这些关系甚至可以制约检察院和法院的的决定。

sentences.english: The people's procuratorates have the right to exercise procuratorial authority.
sentences.chinese: 人民检察院是通过行使检察权来完成自己的任务的。

sentences.english: The competent organ shall, without delay, inform the People's Procuratorate of how it has handled the case.
sentences.chinese: 有关主管机关应当将处理结果及时通知人民检察院。

definition: public prosecutor/public procurator (judicial officer whose job may involve both criminal investigation and public prosecution)
public security bureau (government office similar in function to a police station)
to raise a charge/to sue/to institute proceedings
to protest against a verdict/to lodge an appeal

pinyin: Zui4 gao1 Ren2 min2 Jian3 cha2 yuan4
